now let's look at a lyric from the first

even though your heart is frowning so
the words even though and the ones we're
going to talk about we use them when
we're talking about two contradictory
facts or statements so even though this
thing happened this other thing also
happened you got it here are some
examples
even though traffic in Vietnam quite
chaotic I like living here
even though I had fun for breakfast and
lunch I had it for dinner too
I failed the test even though I studied
for 10 minutes no way no that one
actually doesn't work how about how
about this I failed the test even though
I studied for three weeks that's better
that's better you can also use the words
though or although like this although he
is a frog he dates a pig or though he is
a frog he dates a pig one more example
though he is a fish he is the American
president alright let's hear the chorus
one more time we can be stopped and we
can be homeless we could be broke
the effect of all these silver

made just in it saying we could be
homeless we could be starving we could
be broke as long as you love me this is
what's known as a conditional statement
which is something that tells you if
this thing is true then this other thing
is also true in this case Justin Bieber
who was very rich is saying that he's
totally cool with being homeless as long
as this girl loves him and you know what
I'm going to call BS on jayegi on that
one I mean we've all been in love before
but if that person said to you hey let's
go live in a dumpster behind the mall so
we can save money on rent but it's okay
because I love you you'd probably cut it
off with them real quick let's do some
examples as long as you watch these
videos you will be a genius
or this as long as you eat love to RIA
every night you will be fat as long as
you are fat you will not have a

more Lotteria now you try it leave an

there is another thing we can learn from
this song in the lyrics Justin tells his
girlfriend to keep it together so keep
it together means you should stay calm
and not freak out when you're stressed
or angry and in the second verse he says
don't stress don't cry just take my head
off yeah definitely these are phrases of
support and encouragement he's trying to
let her know that everything is going to
be okay and of course you can use them
too for example if your mom is mad at
you because you hit your brother you can
say don't stress mom he deserved it now
of course if your mother doesn't speak
English then she won't understand you
but that's okay at least you'll be
practicing and that's it for today class
